core.sort_tuples¶

core.sort_tuples(tuple_list)[source]¶

Sort a list of tuples by their second elements

Parameters

tuple_list (list) – an unsorted list of tuples

Returns

tuple_list – a list of tuples sorted by their 2nd term

Return type

list

Examples

Sort a list of (key, value) by their values >>> import cloudburst as cb >>> tl = [(“CONCURRENT”, 5), (“STUDIO”, 2), (“TEST”, 8)] >>> tl = cb.tuple_list(tl) >>> print(tl)

cloudburst
